00036 // This is the standard implementation of sumleq (and sumgeq)
00037 
00038 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_FULLSUM_H
00039 #define CONSTRAINT_FULLSUM_H
00040 
00041 
00042 #ifdef P
00043 #undef P
00044 #endif
00045 
00046 //#define P(x) cout << x << endl
00047 #define P(x)
00048 
00051 template<typename VarArray, typename VarSum, BOOL is_reversed = false>
00052 struct LessEqualSumConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00053 {
00054   virtual string constraint_name()
00055   { return "<=Sumup"; }
00056   
00057   //typedef BoolLessSumConstraint<VarArray, VarSum,1-VarToCount> NegConstraintType;
00058   typedef typename VarArray::value_type VarRef;
00059   
00060   bool no_negatives;
00061     
00062   VarArray var_array;  
00063   VarSum var_sum;
00064   Reversible<DomainInt> max_looseness;
00065   Reversible<DomainInt> var_array_min_sum;
00066   LessEqualSumConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj, const VarArray& _var_array, VarSum _var_sum) :
00067     AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), var_array(_var_array), var_sum(_var_sum), max_looseness(_stateObj), 
00068     var_array_min_sum(_stateObj)
00069   {
00070     no_negatives = true;
00071     for(int i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00072     {
00073       if(var_array[i].getInitialMin() < 0)
00074       {
00075         no_negatives = false;
00076         return;
00077       }
00078     }
00079   }
00080   
00081   virtual triggerCollection setup_internal()
00082   {
00083     triggerCollection t;
00084     
00085     int array_size = var_array.size();
00086     for(int i = 0; i < array_size; ++i)
00087     {
00088       t.push_back(make_trigger(var_array[i], Trigger(this, i), LowerBound));
00089     }
00090     t.push_back(make_trigger(var_sum, Trigger(this, -1), UpperBound));
00091     return t;    
00092   }
00093   
00094   DomainInt get_real_min_sum()
00095   {
00096     DomainInt min_sum = 0;
00097     for(typename VarArray::iterator it = var_array.begin(); it != var_array.end(); ++it)
00098       min_sum += it->getMin();
00099     return min_sum;
00100   }
00101   
00102   DomainInt get_real_max_diff()
00103   {
00104     DomainInt max_diff = 0;
00105     for(typename VarArray::iterator it = var_array.begin(); it != var_array.end(); ++it)
00106       max_diff = max(max_diff, it->getMax() - it->getMin());
00107     return max_diff;
00108   }
00109   
00110   virtual void propagate(int prop_val, DomainDelta domain_change)
00111   {
00112     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(FullSum);
00113     DomainInt sum = var_array_min_sum;
00114     if(prop_val != -1)
00115     { // One of the array changed
00116       int change = var_array[prop_val].getDomainChange(domain_change);
00117       D_ASSERT(change >= 0);
00118       sum += change;
00119       var_array_min_sum = sum;
00120     }
00121     
00122     var_sum.setMin(sum);
00123     if(getState(stateObj).isFailed())
00124         return;
00125     D_ASSERT(sum <= get_real_min_sum());
00126     
00127     DomainInt looseness = var_sum.getMax() - sum;
00128     if(looseness < 0)
00129     { 
00130       getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00131       return;
00132     }
00133 
00134     if(looseness < max_looseness)
00135     {
00136       // max_looseness.set(looseness);
00137       for(typename VarArray::iterator it = var_array.begin(); it != var_array.end(); ++it)
00138         it->setMax(it->getMin() + looseness);
00139     }
00140   }
00141   
00142   virtual BOOL check_unsat(int prop_val, DomainDelta domain_change)
00143   {
00144     DomainInt sum = var_array_min_sum;
00145     if(prop_val != -1)
00146     { // One of the array changed
00147       sum += var_array[prop_val].getDomainChange(domain_change);
00148       var_array_min_sum = sum;
00149     }
00150     return var_sum.getMax() < sum;
00151   }
00152   
00153   virtual BOOL full_check_unsat()
00154   {
00155     DomainInt min_sum = get_real_min_sum();
00156     DomainInt max_diff = get_real_max_diff();
00157     
00158     var_array_min_sum = min_sum;
00159     max_looseness = max_diff;
00160     if(!var_array.empty())
00161       return check_unsat(0,0);
00162     else
00163     { 
00164       // Just set sum = 0 from check_unsat
00165       return var_sum.getMax() < 0;
00166     }
00167   }
00168   
00169   virtual void full_propagate()
00170   {
00171     DomainInt min_sum = 0;
00172     DomainInt max_diff = 0;
00173     for(typename VarArray::iterator it = var_array.begin(); it != var_array.end(); ++it)
00174     {
00175       min_sum += it->getMin();
00176       max_diff = max(max_diff, it->getMax() - it->getMin());
00177     }
00178     
00179     var_array_min_sum = min_sum;
00180     D_ASSERT(min_sum == get_real_min_sum());
00181     max_looseness = max_diff;
00182     if(!var_array.empty())
00183       propagate(0,0);
00184     else
00185       var_sum.setMin(0);
00186   }
00187   
00188   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00189   {
00190     D_ASSERT(v_size == var_array.size() + 1);
00191     DomainInt sum = 0;
00192     for(int i = 0; i < v_size - 1; i++)
00193       sum += v[i];
00194     return sum <= *(v + v_size - 1);
00195   }
00196   
00197   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00198   {
00199     P("GSA");
00200     int sum_value = 0;
00201     int v_size = var_array.size();
00202     
00203     if(no_negatives)   // How are the two cases different? They look identical.
00204     {
00205       int max_sum = var_sum.getMax();
00206       assignment.push_back(make_pair(v_size, max_sum));
00207       for(int i = 0; i < v_size && sum_value <= max_sum; ++i)
00208       {
00209         int min_val = var_array[i].getMin();
00210         assignment.push_back(make_pair(i, min_val));
00211         sum_value += min_val;
00212       }
00213       P("A" << (sum_value <= max_sum));
00214       return (sum_value <= max_sum);
00215     }
00216     else
00217     {
00218       for(int i = 0; i < v_size; ++i)
00219       {
00220         assignment.push_back(make_pair(i, var_array[i].getMin()));
00221         sum_value += var_array[i].getMin();
00222       }
00223       P("B" << (sum_value <= var_sum.getMax()));
00224       if(sum_value > var_sum.getMax())
00225         return false;
00226       else
00227         assignment.push_back(make_pair(v_size, var_sum.getMax()));
00228       return true;
00229     }
00230   }
00231   
00232   
00233   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00234   { 
00235     vector<AnyVarRef> array_copy(var_array.size() + 1);
00236     for(unsigned i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00237       array_copy[i] = var_array[i];
00238     array_copy[var_array.size()] = var_sum;
00239     return array_copy;
00240   }
00241 
00242   virtual AbstractConstraint* reverse_constraint()
00243   { return rev_implement<is_reversed>(); }
00244 
00245  template<bool b> 
00246   typename disable_if_c<b, AbstractConstraint*>::type rev_implement()
00247   {
00248     typename NegType<VarArray>::type new_var_array(var_array.size());
00249     for(unsigned i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00250       new_var_array[i] = VarNegRef(var_array[i]);
00251 
00252     typedef typename ShiftType<typename NegType<VarSum>::type, compiletime_val<-1> >::type SumType;
00253     SumType new_sum = ShiftVarRef( VarNegRef(var_sum), compiletime_val<-1>());
00254 
00255     return new LessEqualSumConstraint<typename NegType<VarArray>::type, SumType, true>
00256       (stateObj, new_var_array, new_sum);   
00257   }
00258 
00259   template<bool b>
00260   typename enable_if_c<b, AbstractConstraint*>::type rev_implement()
00261     { FAIL_EXIT(); }
00262     
00263   };  
00264   
00265 #endif
